author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Bella Hadid announced as the new face of Tag Heuer | Daily Mail Online
text: The 20-year-old added extra height to her lengthy frame with a pair of black pumps. The Victoria's Secret beauty was in the zone with a pair of Everlast boxing gloves. Fitness attire: The model was clad in a sports bra and leggings Focused: The Victoria's Secret beauty was in the zone with a pair of Everlast boxing gloves Girly: The 20-year-old added extra height to her lengthy frame with a pair of black pumps Bella's many career opportunities, including her turn as a Victoria's Secret model, have kept the young starlet preoccupied since her very public breakup last year. In November 2016, after nearly two years together, the sister of Gagi Hadid split with singer The Weeknd. The vocalist has reportedly moved on to Selena Gomez. Focused on work: Bella's many career opportunities, including her turn as a Victoria's Secret model, have kept the young starlet preoccupied since her very public breakup last year Seperate ways: In November 2016, after nearly two years together, the sister of Gagi Hadid split with singer The Weeknd The DKNY model chatted with Teen Vogue about her former love. 'Love hurts, but you have to pull through,' she began. 'It was my first breakup…and so public. As an outsider, you might think I handled it so well, but it’s always in your heart, and you always feel it very heavily. It'll be hard for a while.' 'But I’ll always respect him, and I’ll always love him. Sometimes you want to be sad about it or handle it differently, but at the end of the day, you never want to burn a bridge that you’ve fought so hard to build.' Stunning: Leona Lewis, 31, looked pretty in a white dress and silver heels Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
